V05n746:16: videheṣu videharājo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ va kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca |
V05n746:18: khaṇḍo'grāmātyo dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati nyāyataśca vyavahāranpaśyati yataḥ sarva eva janakāyastanmukho'vasthitaḥ |
V05n746:20: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
V05n746:21: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ |
V05n746:22: tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśati divasānpūrvavadyāvad gopa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam |
V05n746:23: bhūyo'pyasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ |
V05n746:24: tasyāpi pūrvavadvistareṇa siṃha iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam |
V05n746:26: khaṇḍo'grāmātyaḥ pūrvameva śūro vikrāntaḥ pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī yenāmātyānāmagraḥ |
V05n746:27: yadā putrabalī jātastadā bhūyasyā mātrayā sarvāmātyānabhibhūyāvasthitaḥ |
V05n746:28: tataste'mātyā upahatatejasaḥ parasparaṃ sañjalpaṃ kṛtvā sañjātāmarṣā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ |
V05n746:32: kuto bhavatāṃ vimarṣo'haṃ rājā ko'nya iti |
V05n746:35: yadi tasyābhirucitaṃ syāddevaṃ rājyāccyāvayitvā svayameva paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayediti |
V05n746:41: yadā tu rājakṛtiṃ kṛtvā niṣkrāntastadā tadrājakulaṃ śūnyamavasthitam |
V05n746:47: yadi khaṇḍasyābhirucitaṃ syāddevaṃ rājyāccyācayitvā svayameva paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājyaisvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayediti |
V05n746:59: yadi śrāvastīṃ gamiṣyāmi rājādhīnā śrāvastī tatrāpyeṣa evādīnavaḥ |
V05n746:69: bhavanto'haṃ vaiśālīṃ samprasthitoyeṣāṃ yuṣmākamabhirucitamihāvasthānaṃ te'bhitiṣṭhantu yeṣāṃ nābhirucitaṃ te sajjā bhavantu gacchāmaḥ |
V05n746:71: yūyaṃ gomahiṣīḥ yena vaiśālīṃ tena khaṭayata |
V05n746:74: tato janakāyamevaṃ prerayitvā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ pādayornipatya kathayati |
V05n746:78: śodyānaśobhāṃ kārayitvā sārādānaṃ śakaṭeṣvāropya upari khādanīyabhojanīyena ācchādya saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n746:81: te tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti |
V05n746:85: te caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ sannāhya nirgatāḥ kathayanti |
V05n746:89: aho vata khaṇḍaḥ kālaṃ kuryānniṣpalāyeta iti vā iti |
V05n746:92: te rājñaścittānurakṣayā kāṇḍakāṇḍiṃ kṛtvā nivṛttā rājñaḥ kathayanti |
V05n746:97: tena khalu samayena vaiśālī tribhiḥ skandhaiḥ prativasati |
V05n746:98: prathame skandhe sapta kūṭāgārasahasrāṇi suvarṇamayairniryūhairmadhyame skandhe caturdaśarūṣyamayairniryūhairadharime skandhe ekaviṃśatistāgramayairniryūhaisteṣu yathāyogaṃ manuṣyāḥ prativasanti |
V05n746:101: yā prathame skandhe dārikā jāyate sā prathama eva skandhe dīyate na madhyame nādharime |
V05n746:102: yā madhyame sā prathame skandhe dīyate madhyame vā nādharime |
V05n746:104: kanyāyā anirvāhaḥ nānyatra dīyate iti vaiśālīstraratnaṃ na kasyaciddīyate |
V05n746:106: khaṇḍasya pradhānapuruṣa iti kṛtvā prathame skandhe gṛhaṃ dattam |
V05n746:108: yadā gaṇaḥ saṃnipatati tadāsāvāhūyamāno'pi na saṃnipatati |
V05n746:119: matamapi nānuprayacchāmi yasmānmatādeva me ādīnavāḥ prādurbhūtā iti |
V05n746:123: sa ca nigame saṃnipatati mataṃ cānuprayacchati |
V05n746:124: pūrvaṃ vaiśālakā licchavayo yasya kasyacillekhamanupreṣayanti sa karkaśamanupreṣayanti |
V05n746:125: yadā tu khaṇḍo mataṃ dātumārabdhastadā sānunayaṃ likhanti |
V05n746:126: yeṣāṃ sānunayo lekho nīto bhavati te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurvanti |
V05n746:127: bhavantaḥ ko yogo yena vaiśālako gaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ sakarkaśaṃ likhati idānīṃ tu sānunayamiti |
V05n746:130: videharājasya khaṇḍo nāmā'grāmātya ihāgatasya matenā'nuvyavaharanti yenādhunā sānunayaṃ likhantīti |
V05n746:131: khaṇḍena gopasya siṃhasya ca niveśanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n746:132: siṃhasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato duhitā jātā |
V05n746:133: tasyāpi vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā celeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam |
V05n746:134: sā naimittikena dṛṣṭvā vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati |
V05n746:135: sa pitaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopya svayameva paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājyaṃ kāryiṣyatīti |
V05n746:136: bhūyo'sya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato duhitā jātā |
V05n746:137: tasyā api vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvopaceleti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam |
V05n746:138: sāpi naimittikena vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati lakṣaṇasampūrṇamiti |
V05n746:139: gopo vyāḍo vikrānto vaiśālakānāṃ licchavīnāmudyānāni vināśayati |
V05n746:149: putra vaiśālakā licchavayo vyāḍā vikrāntā mā teṣāmudyānāni vināśaya mā te anarthaṃ kariṣyantīti |
V05n746:151: tāta eṣāmudyānāni santi asmākaṃ tu na santi |
V05n746:154: tena gaṇo vijñapto mama putrayorudyānaṃ nāsti |
V05n746:159: dvitīyena vihāraḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ - tathā sthavirairapi sūtrānte upanibaddhaṃ buddho bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati gopasiṃhaśālavane iti |
V05n746:163: putra gaccha tvamamukakarvaṭaṃ tatra svādhiṣṭhitān karmāntān kāraya |
V05n746:165: sa tatra gatvā svādhiṣṭhitān karmāntān kārayitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n746:168: so'pi kaṃcit kālaṃ dharmeṇa senāpatyaṃ kārayitvā kālagataḥ |
V05n746:176: yadyasau senāpatye sthāpyate niyataṃ gaṇasya bhedaṃ kariṣyati yastu tasya bhrātā siṃhaḥ sa sūrataḥ sukhasaṃvāsaḥ śraknoti gaṇasya cittamārāgayitum |
V05n746:177: yadi gaṇasyābhirucitaṃ taṃ senāpatiṃ sthāpayāma iti |
V05n746:182: mama jyeṣṭho bhrātā gopastaṃ senāpatiṃ sthāpayateti |
V05n746:184: siṃha na yuṣmākaṃ kulakamāgataṃ senāpatyaṃ yo gaṇasyābhirucitaḥ sa senāpatirbhavati |
V05n746:185: yadi bhavato nābhirucitaṃ vayamanyaṃ senāpatiṃ sthāpayāma iti |
V05n746:191: vaiśālakāḥ pūrvaṃ yasya lekhamanupreṣayanti tasya khaṇḍapramukho gaṇa ājñāpayatīti likhanti |
V05n746:192: yadā siṃha senāpatiḥ saṃvṛttistadā siṃhapramukho gaṇa ājñāpayatīti |
V05n746:193: yāvadapareṇa samayena yasminkarvaṭake gopaḥ svādhiṣṭhitān karmāntān kārayati tadā karvaṭakaṃ lekho gataḥ |
V05n746:196: bhavantaḥ pūrvaṃ vaiśālako gaṇaḥ khaṇḍapramukho gaṇa ājñāpayatīti likhanti |
V05n746:202: bhrātaḥ yuktaṃ nāma tava mayi jyeṣṭhatare tiṣṭhati senāpatyaṃ kartumiti |
V05n746:214: sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
V05n746:216: deva kasyārthāya devaḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti |
V05n746:218: agramahiṣī me kālagatā kimiti na cintāparastiṣṭhāmi |
V05n746:224: yā sā vyākṛtā lakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ putraṃ janayiṣyatīti |
V05n746:226: rājño bimbisārasyāgramahiṣī kālagatā tvamupacelāmiha praṣayāgramahiṣī bhaviṣyatīti |
V05n746:230: tvameva jānīṣe yathā gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛto nānyatra kanyā dātavyā ṛte vaiśālakāniti |
V05n746:233: tato gopo rājānamavalokya rathamāruhya vaiśālīṃ saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n746:236: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ dauvārikaḥ kālagato'manuṣyakeṣupapannaḥ |
V05n746:238: ahamamanuṣyeṣūpapanno mama yakṣa sthānaṃ kārayata ghaṇṭāṃ cagrīvāyām pralambayata |
V05n746:239: yadi kaścidvaiśālakānāṃ pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitra āgamiṣyati ahaṃ tāvadghaṇṭāśabdaṃ kariṣyāmi yāvad gṛhīto vā niṣpalāyito veti |
V05n746:240: tairyakṣaḥ pratirūpaṃ kṛtvā ghaṇṭāṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhvā nṛtyagītavāditraśabdena balimālyopahāreṇa dvārakoṣṭhake pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ |
V05n746:243: sa vaiśālakaṃ gaṇamavalokya gṛhaṃ gatvā upacelāmāha |
V05n746:259: vaiśālako gaṇaḥ kṣubdhaḥ pratyamitro'smākaṃ vaiśālīṃ praviṣṭa iti |
V05n746:262: gopo'pi santrastaḥ celāṃ rathe āropya saṃprasthitaḥ vaiśālakairdṛṣṭaḥ |
V05n746:264: sa pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī tena pañcalicchaviśatāni marmaṇi tāḍitāni |
V05n746:266: bhavanto mayā yuṣmākaṃ pañcaśatāni marmaṇi tāḍitānyavaśiṣṭaṃ jīvitenācchādayāmi nivartateti |
V05n746:274: patralekhyaṃ kṛtvā peḍāyāṃ prakṣipya jatumudrātāpaṃ kṛtvā sthāpayateti |
V05n746:283: tato'sau duḥkhī durmanā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ |
V05n746:297: bhavanto yo hi putraḥ pitaraṃ ghātayati sa rājyahetoḥ |
V05n746:298: yadi me putro bhaviṣyati tasya jātasyaivāhaṃ paṭṭabandhaṃ kariṣyāmīti |
V05n746:301: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
V05n746:302: yāvadapareṇa samayena rājā bimbisāro mṛgayānirgataḥ anyatamasmiṃścāśramapade ṛṣiḥ pañcābhijñaḥ prativasati |
V05n746:303: yāvanmṛgaḥ śaraparamparayā santrāsitastasya ṛṣerāśramapadānnirgato rājñā śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ |
V05n746:306: tvayā tu śaraṇopagato mṛgaḥ praghātita iti |
V05n746:311: ahaṃ bhavantaḥ yo rājānaṃ paribhāṣate tasya ko daṇḍo deva |
V05n746:321: sarvathā anena me praṇidhānena asyaivāgramahiṣyāḥ kukṣāvupapattiḥ syāditi |
V05n746:322: sa mithyā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā celāyāḥ kukṣāvupapannaḥ |
V05n746:323: yameva divasaṃ pratisandhirgṛhītastameva divasaṃ rudhiravarṣaṃ patitam |
V05n746:329: deva yo'yaṃ sattvo devyāḥ kukṣimavakrāntastasyāyamanubhāva iti |
V05n746:333: deva tūlikāyāṃ māṃsapūrṇāṃ pravṛttiṃ devyā ātmānamupanaya iti |
V05n746:334: tato rājñā māṃsapūrṇayā tūlikayā ātmānaṃ veṣṭayitvā celāyā upanāmitam |
V05n746:340: tato rājñā pañceṅkhikāḥ śirā mocayitvā rudhiraṃ pāyitā |
V05n746:345: bhūyo rājñā naimittikāṃ āhūya pṛṣṭāste kathayanti |
V05n746:346: deva yathā śāstre dṛśyate niyatamayaṃ dārakaḥ pitaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopya svayameva paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājyaṃ kārayiṣyatīti |
V05n746:351: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ mahānāmo licchaviḥ prativasati |
V05n746:362: śrutvā mahānāmo gṛhapatirbhūyasyā mātrayā vismayamāpannastasmiṃścodyāne ārakṣakānpuruṣānsamantataḥ sthāpayitvā divasān gaṇayitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n746:363: yāvatsaptamedivase tasminnudyāne apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpite candanavāripariṣikte surabhidhūpaghaṇṭikopanibaddhe āmuktapadṛdāmakalāpe puṣpāvakīrṇe anekagītavāditraninādite suhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhajanaparivṛto mahatā śrīsamudayena antaḥpurasahito nirgatastasya tasmiṃścodyāne krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kadalīstambhaḥ sphuṭitaḥ |
V05n746:371: yāvanmahānāmo gṛhapatirudyānātsvagṛhaṃ gata āmrapālī dārikā caryāte pūrvavadyāvanmahatī saṃvṛttā |
V05n746:372: tasyā varā āgacchanti krauñcāḥ śākyāścānte nānādeśanivāsino rājaputrā |
V05n746:378: yasyaiva nā dāsyāmi tasyaiva dviḍ bhaviṣyāmi |
V05n746:382: śṛṇvantu bhavanto brahmaṇā gṛhapatayo mamodyāne dārikā utpannā sā mayā āpāyitā poṣitā saṃvardhitā |
V05n746:386: gṛhapate gaṇena pūrvameva kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ kanyā anivārhā strīranaṃ gaṇabhogyamiti |
V05n746:390: tām rūpayauvanasaṃpannām dṛṣṭvā sarva eva gaṇo vismayotphulladṛṣṭiḥ samantato nirokṣitumārabdhaḥ kathayati ca |
V05n746:393: sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
V05n746:396: putro tvaṃ strīratnamiti kṛtvā gaṇabhogyā saṃvṛttā |
V05n746:399: putri gaṇena pūrvameva kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ strīratnaṃ gaṇabhogyamiti |
V05n746:404: yadā gṛhavicayo bhavati tadā mama gṛhaṃ saptame divase pratyavekṣyate |
V05n746:405: niṣkāśaḥ praveśaśca madgṛhaṃ pravekṣyatāṃ na vicāryata iti |
V05n746:414: yat kathayati yaḥ praviśati tena paṃcakārṣāpaṇaśatānyādāya praveṣṭavyamiti |
V05n746:417: yat kathayati saptame divase gṛhavicayaḥ kartavyaḥ ityetadapi yuktam |
V05n746:418: pūrvaṃ vā kriyeta paścādvā ko'tra virodhaḥ |
V05n746:424: tato gaṇena tasyāḥ pañca varā dattāḥ |
V05n746:434: bhavanto yena yādṛśo rājā vā rājamātro vā dhanī vā śreṣṭhī vā vaṇik vā sārthavāho vā dṛṣṭaḥ sa tattādṛśaṃ bhitto likhatviti |
V05n746:436: tata āmrapālī nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitā citrakarma pratyavekṣate pṛcchati ca |
V05n746:445: evaṃ sarve tayā pṛṣṭāstairapi sarvaiḥ samākhyātāḥ |
V05n746:448: yādṛśo'sya puruṣasyārohapariṇāhaḥ śakṣyatyeṣa mayā sārdhaṃ paricārayitumiti |
V05n746:449: yāvadapareṇa samayena rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāra upari prāsādatalagato'mātyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ satkathayā tiṣṭhati |
V05n746:450: bhavantaḥ kena kīdṛśī veśyā atīvarūpayaunasaṃpannā catuḥṣaṣṭhikalābhijñā devasyaivopabhogyā |
V05n746:452: gopa yadyevaṃ gacchāmo vaiśālīṃ tayā sārdhaṃ paricārayāmaḥ sa kathayati |
V05n746:453: devasya vaiśālakā licchavayo dīrgharātraṃ bādhakāḥ pratyarthinaḥ pratyamitrāḥ |
V05n746:460: sa rathamabhiruhya gopena sārdham vaiśālīṃ samprasthito'nupūrveṇa vaiśālīṃ gataḥ |
V05n746:476: saptāhaṃ tāvat krīḍa ramasva paricāraya saptāhasyātyayāt kālajñā bhaviṣyāmīti |
V05n746:477: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati yāvadāmrapālī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā |
V05n746:480: tena tasyā viralī aṅgulimudrā ca dattā |
V05n746:483: atha dārakaḥ etāṃ viralīṃ prāvṛtya aṃgulimudrāṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhā matsakāśaṃ preṣayasi |
V05n746:484: (sa) ca nirgatya gopena sārdhaṃ rathamabhiruhya saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n746:488: pañcalicchaviśatāni baddhagodhāṅgulitrāṇāni rājño bimbisārasya pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhhāni |
V05n746:500: bhavantaḥ sa evāyaṃ puruṣarākṣaso nivartāmaha iti |
V05n746:514: putra yadi bhūyaḥ pṛcchanti vaktavyastādṛśo mama pitā yo yuṣmākamekasyāpi nāstīti |
V05n746:518: yāvatsa taiḥ sārdhaṃ bhūyaḥ krīḍitumārabdhaḥ sa taistathaivoktaḥ |
V05n746:520: tādṛśo me pitā yo yuṣmākamekasyāpi nāsti |
V05n746:525: sā saṃlakṣayati vaiśālakā licchavayo vyāḍā vikrāntāḥ |
V05n746:529: tayā ta upalabdhā uktāśca anenāṅgulimudrakeṇa bhāṇḍaṃ mudrayitvā gacchata |
V05n746:536: tutra tvayā rājño'rthādhikaraṇe niṣaṇṇasya muktāhāraṃ pādayoḥ sthāpayitvābhiruhyotsaṅge nisattavyam |
V05n746:537: yadi kaścit kathayati nāyaṃ dārako vibhetīti |
V05n746:549: abhayo rājakumāro'bhayo rājakumāra iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā |
V05n746:553: tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe'nyataraḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogī |
V05n746:559: sa paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gataḥ sopasṛṣṭāmbaravasanā kleśairbādhitumārabdhā |
V05n746:561: tayā ca vātāyanasthayā rājñaḥ sragdāmaṃ kṣiptam |
V05n746:569: sā tasminsamaye kalyāṇī ṛtumatī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā |
V05n746:572: tato rājñā tasyāpi aṅgulimudrakañcitrā ca viralī dattā |
V05n746:575: etāṃ viralikāṃ prāvṛtya aṅgulimudrakaṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhvā mama preṣayiṣyasi |
V05n746:583: mayā evaṃ rūpamakṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ sa cāgataḥ |
V05n746:588: ahaṃ tathā kariṣye yathā na śīghramāgamiṣyatīti |
V05n746:591: tena vinā tvayā iha na praveṣṭavyamiti |
V05n746:597: tayā peḍāyāṃ prakṣipya ghṛtasya madhunaścāpyaṃ pūrayitvā aṃgulimudrakaṃ grīvāyāṃ baddhvā viralikayā pracchādya preṣyadārikā abhihitā |
V05n746:598: gaccha tvametāṃ peḍāṃ rājakuladvāraṃ nītvā maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā pradīpaṃ prajvālya ekānte tiṣṭha yāvatkenacid gṛhīta iti |
V05n746:599: tayā yathākṛtaṃ yāvadrājā upari prāsādatalagato abhayena rājakumāreṇa sārdhaṃ tiṣṭhati |
V05n746:602: paśyata bhavantaḥ kimeṣa rājakuladvāre pradīpo jvalatīti |
V05n746:615: tato rājñā aṅgulimudrakaṃ viralikāṃ ca pratyabhijñāya abhayāya sa rājakumārāya dattaḥ |
V05n746:617: rājñā jīvakavādena samudācarito'bhayena ca rājakumāreṇa bhṛta iti jīvakaḥ kumārabhṛto jīvakaḥ kumārabhṛta iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā |
V05n746:621: vayamapi kiñcicchilpaṃ śikṣāmahe yadasmākamuttarakālaṃ jīvikā bhaviṣyatīti |
V05n746:623: rathakāraśca śaklavāsāḥ śuklavāsobhiḥ puruṣaiḥ parivṛto rājakulaṃ praviśati |
V05n746:624: so'bhayena rājakumāreṇa dṛṣṭastenānye ca rājapuruṣāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ ka eṣa iti |
V05n746:638: jīvakenāpi vaidyo dṛṣṭaḥ śuklavāsāḥ śuklavāsobhiḥ puruṣaiḥ parivṛto rājakulaṃ praviśan |
V05n746:639: tenāpare ca pṛṣṭāḥ ka eṣa iti |
V05n746:645: atha preto na mārgyo na pṛcchyaḥ |
V05n746:655: sa kapālīmocanīṃ tu vidyāṃ na jānāti |
V05n746:669: eṣa mama putro vaidyakaṃ śikṣitumātreyasya sakāśaṃ gacchatyasya sarvayogodvahanaṃ kartavyamiti |
V05n746:671: puṣkarasāriṇā ca lekhaṃ vācayitvā ātreyasya samarpitaḥ |
V05n746:674: so'lpataramupadiśati jīvakaḥ saviśeṣaṃ gṛhṇātyācarati ātreyasya yadā glānāvalokako gacchati tadā ekamādāya gacchati |
V05n746:684: sa ātreyeṇa sārdhaṃ niṣkramyaḥ punaḥ praviṣṭaḥ |
V05n746:687: yanmayā bhaiṣajyaṃ vyupadiṣṭaṃ tanna deyamidaṃ cedaṃ ca deyamiti |
V05n746:696: kiṃ mayā pūrvamādiṣṭaṃ kiṃ vā paścāt |
V05n746:697: taiḥ samākhyātamidaṃ tvayā sākṣād vyupadiṣṭam idaṃ jīvakena saṃdiṣṭamiti |
V05n746:699: ham jīvakaḥ prājña iti viditvā kathayati yad jīvakena vyupadiṣṭaṃ taddātavyamiti |
V05n746:702: te'nye māṇavakāḥ kathayantyupādhyāya tvamasya rājaputra iti kṛtvā yatnato vyupadeśaṃ karoṣyasmākaṃ na karoṣīti |
V05n746:709: tena te māṇavakāḥ sarve vithīṃ preṣitāstvayā'mukasya dravyasya mūlyaṃ praṣṭavyaṃ tvayā'mukasyeti |
V05n746:712: yadyupādhyāyo'nyasya dravyasya mūlyaṃ prakṣyati kiṃ mayā vaktavyam |
V05n746:726: ityarthamahaṃ kathayāmīti jīvakaḥ prājño'hamalpaṃ vyupadiśāmyayaṃ svaśaktyā vibhajatīti |
V05n746:733: yāvajjīvakenā'rdhapathe gopāṃganāṃ dṛṣṭā dadhighaṭakiṭālapiṇḍaṃ cādāyātreyayasakāśaṃ saṃprasthitā'tīvākṣīrogārtā |
V05n746:741: tena kiṭālapiṇḍako gṛhīto dadhighaṭastu tasyā evaṃ dattaḥ |
V05n746:762: sa kathayatyupādhyāya sarvameva bhaiṣajyaṃ nāsti kiñcidabhaiṣajyam |
V05n746:763: api tu mayā śaramūlamānītam pāṣāṇavartikā kiṭālapiṇḍaśceti |
V05n746:785: sa kathayati upādhyāya vayaṃ rājakule saṃvṛddhāḥ kathaṃ na jānīmaḥ |
V05n746:803: api tu yadyupādhyāyasya vimarṣaḥ sa sārtho'muṣminpradeśe tatra kañcinmāṇavaṃ preṣaya |
V05n746:812: yāvadanyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ kapālavyādhinā spṛṣṭa ātreyasakāśaṃ gataḥ kathayatyātreya mama cikitsāṃ kuru |
V05n746:814: bhoḥ puruṣa adya tāvadgartāṃ khānaya gomayaṃ ca samupānaya |
V05n746:818: bhoḥ puruṣa yat kiṃcidahaṃ śikṣe sarvaṃ tatsattvahitahetoḥ |
V05n746:825: tata ātreyeṇāgatya sa puruṣo gartāyāṃ nikhātaḥ |
V05n746:840: jīvaka parituṣṭo'haṃ snātvā'gaccha kapālamocanīṃ vidyāṃ dāsyāmīti |
V05n746:844: jīvakāsmākaṃ jīvikaiṣā na tvayeha viṣaye prayoktavyā |
V05n746:846: jīvaka ātreyamupāmantrya puṣkarasāriṇo rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvopāmaṃtrayati |
V05n746:849: tena khalu samayena puṣkarasāriṇo rājñaḥ pāṇḍavā nāma khaṣā viruddhāḥ |
V05n746:851: jīvaka mama pāṇḍavā nāma khaṣā viruddhāstāṃstāvat saṃnāmaya paścādyāsyasi |
V05n746:857: vandigograhakarapratyāyāṃśca gṛhītvā svastitaḥ pratyāgataḥ yathānītaṃ ca rājñe upanāmitam |
V05n746:860: tato jīvako'nupūrveṇa bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ tatraiva varṣārātramavasthitam |
V05n746:863: anyatamaśca puruṣaḥ kāṣṭhabhāramādāya nagaraṃ praviśatyasthicarmāvaśeṣaḥ samantād gātreṇādharataḥ |
V05n746:865: bhoḥ puruṣaḥ kena te īdṛśī samavasthā iti |
V05n746:867: api tu mayā caiṣa kāṣṭhabhārako gṛhīto bhavati |
V05n746:877: tasyedṛśaḥ prabhāvo yadā vyāghitasya purastāt sthāpyate tadā vyādhiryathābhūtā ca dṛśyate pradīpeneva gṛhagataṃ dravyam |
V05n746:880: sa droṇaṃ māpayitvā'ḍhakena śirasi prahāraṃ dadāti |
V05n746:881: jīvakena dṛṣṭa uktaśca bhoḥ puruṣa kimarthamevaṃ karoṣi |
V05n746:885: tato jīvakena sarvabhūtaprasādako maṇistasya śirasi sthāpito yāvatpaśyati śatapadīm |
V05n746:887: bhoḥ puruṣa tava śirasi śatapadī tiṣṭhatīti |
V05n746:888: sa pādayornipatya kathayati cikitsāṃ me kuruṣveti |
V05n746:892: sa tenoktaḥ bhoḥ puruṣādya gartaṃ khānaya pāṣi ca samupānaya cikitsāṃ kariṣyāmīti |
V05n746:894: jīvakenāpyaparasmindivase sa puruṣo garte nikhāte nikhātya kapālamocanayā vidyayā kapālaṃ mocayitvā taptena saṃdaṃśena śatapadī spṛṣṭā |
V05n746:897: svasthībhṛtaḥ ḥ tena tasya paṃcakārṣāpaṇaśatāni dattāni |
V05n746:902: tasya putro gṛhasvāmo saṃvṛttaḥ tena tasminnudyāne ārakṣakaḥ puruṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ |
V05n746:907: yāvadanyatara udārī manuṣyaḥ sarvavaidyapratyākhyātastadudyānaṃ gatvā rātriṃ vāsamupagataḥ |
V05n746:914: nāsti te kaścit chāgasaṭāyā dhūpaṃ dātā yena tvaṃ dvādaśayojanāni niṣpalāyeriti |
V05n746:916: tavāpi nāsti kaścinmūlakabījamudaśvinā piṣṭā dātā yena tvaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ niśīryethā iti |
V05n746:918: sa kalyamevotthāya tasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ |
V05n746:929: bhoḥ puruṣa kimarthaṃ tvamatrāmanuṣyakādhyuṣite udyāne tiṣṭhasīti |
V05n746:949: amba eṣa mallo mallena nihataḥ kālagato nīyate |
V05n746:955: tato'sāvutthāya mṛtasakāśaṃ gatvā pṛcchati bhavantaḥ kimetaditi |
V05n746:963: tato jīvakena ca sarvabhūtaprasādakamaṇiḥ śirasi sthāpayitvā pratyavekṣitaḥ |
V05n746:965: tena nāḍikāyāṃ cūrṇaṃ prakṣipya mukhe vāyunā preritam |
V05n746:974: sā tena sārdhaṃ paricārayati sa kālaṃ karoti |
V05n746:976: tayā śrutaṃ jīvako vaidya ihāgata iti |
V05n746:980: jīvakastāṃ dṛṣṭvā kathālāpaṃ ca śrutvā saṃraktaḥ kathayati |
V05n746:981: samayataḥ vikitsāṃ karomi yadi ca mayā sārdhaṃ paricārayasīti |
V05n746:993: sa karṇau pidhāya kathayati bhagini tvaṃ mama |
V05n746:1001: jīvakena tatsarvamupalakṣitaṃ yathā samdhibandhāyāḥ snāyugulphādayaḥ evamavasthitā iti |
V05n746:1015: pūrvaṃ mayā upādhyāyopadeśena karma kṛtamidānīṃ svamatena karma kariṣyāmīti |
V05n746:1022: tao jīvakena taṃ puruṣaṃ bhūmau nipātayitvā sā bhūmirudakena siktā |
V05n746:1024: śatapadī prāvṛṭ kāla iti kṛtvā niṣkrāntā |
V05n746:1033: rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutam yathā jīvaka āgata iti |
V05n746:1034: tenājātaśatroḥ kumārasyājñā dattā putra bhrātā te āgacchati pratyudgamako gaccheti |
V05n746:1036: jīvakena śrutam yathā ajātaśatruḥ kumāraḥ pratyudgacchatīti |
V05n746:1037: sa saṃlakṣayati yadyahamasya pratyudgamanaṃ svīkariṣyāmaiti yadā rājā bhaviṣyati tadānarthaṃ me kariṣyatīti |
V05n746:1039: apareṇa samayena jīvako mahājanakāyaparivṛto vyākṣiptacitto gacchati |
V05n746:1052: kiṃ te jīvakena yattena mamopadiṣṭaṃ tatkuruṣveti |
V05n746:1055: apareṇasamayena rājño bimbisārasya mūrdhni piṭako jātaḥ |
V05n746:1063: deva jīvake mahāvaidye'va tiṣṭhamāne kathaṃ vayaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ |
V05n746:1069: deva samayataḥ karomi yadyahameva devaṃ snapayāmi |
V05n746:1071: tato jīvakenāmalakaṃ dadatā pācanīyāni dravyāṇi dattāni |
V05n746:1073: yadā pakvaḥ tadā pracchannaṃ kṣureṇa spṛṣṭaḥ sphuṭitaḥ tato rohaṇīyāni dravyāni dattāni |
V05n746:1085: ādarśaṃ gṛhītvā vyavalokayati tathāpi na paśyati |
V05n746:1097: bhoḥ puruṣa tavāhaṃ darśanamapi na samanupaśyāmi kutaḥ svasthīkariṣyāmi |
V05n746:1116: yadi cikitsāṃ kariṣyatyatīva kuśalaṃ nocedātmānaṃ ghātayiṣyāmīti |
V05n746:1125: tatra citāyāṃ jvalantyāṃ babhrunakulaścandanagodhā ca yudhyamānau patitau |
V05n746:1130: tatra gatvā kodravodanaṃ mathitaṃ ca pītam |
V05n746:1133: apareṇa samayena vaidehayā guhyapradeśe piṭake jātaḥ |
V05n746:1144: pakvaṃ jñātvā saktupiṇḍamadhye śastrakaṃ prakṣipya ghātryābhihitā |
V05n746:1163: yo'sau gulmī puruṣo jīvakenābhihito durlabhāni bhaiṣajyānīti sa kathayati |
V05n746:1169: bhoḥ puruṣa na matyā tava cikitsā kṛtā |
V05n746:1170: api tu mayoktaṃ durlabhāni te bhaiṣajyānīti |
V05n746:1175: tasya śmaśāne dhmāpyamānasya babhrunakulaścandanagodhā ca citāyāṃ patitaḥ |
V05n746:1179: tataḥ kodravodanaṃ bhuṃkṣe mathitaṃ ca pivasi evaṃ tvaṃ svastho bhavasyetanmatvā mayoktaṃ durlabhāni te bhaiṣajyānīti |
V05n746:1186: yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadatta-kalyāṇamitravigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ tadāsya gulmarogaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
V05n746:1191: tasmin sthite kā śaktirasmākaṃ cikitsāṃ kartumiti |
V05n746:1203: sarvathā roṣayitavya iti viditvā kathayati deva samayena cikitsāṃ karomi |
V05n746:1216: tato jīvakena udāyibhadraḥ kumāraḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ kṛtvā rājña upanāmitaḥ |
V05n746:1221: tato jīvako māṃsārthī śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ gataḥ |
V05n746:1223: tatastena kuṇapamāṃsaṃ gṛhītvopakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ sādhayitvā bhojanakāle rājña upanāmitam |
V05n746:1224: tato rājā ajātaśatruḥ māṃsaśarāvaṃ gṛhītvā bhakṣayiṣyāmīti jīvakenācchidya kapole prahāro dattaḥ |
V05n746:1225: pāpaḥ kārin tvayā pitā dhārmiko dharma rājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ |
V05n746:1230: ūrdhvamadhaśca viriktaḥ sa rudhira evaṃ mukhenāgataḥ |
V05n746:1234: tato jīvaka udāyibhadraṃ kumāraṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitamādāya rājñaḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n746:1236: deva ayamudāyibhadraḥ kumāro na śakyaṃ mayā kuntapipīlakamapi prāṇinaṃ jīvaitād vyaparopayituṃ prāgeva kumāram |
V05n746:1249: jīvako vaidyarāja āhṛtakuśalamūlaḥ kimarthaṃ satyāni na paśyati |
V05n746:1256: atha bhagavān jīvakaṃ vaidyarājamādāya yena himavān parvatarājastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n746:1272: yāṃ na jānīte tāṃ bhagavān kathayati |
V05n746:1279: caturbhijīvakāṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bhiṣak śalyāhartā rājārhaśca bhavati rājayogyaśca rājāṅgatve ca saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
V05n746:1286: iha bhiṣak śalyāhartābādhaṃ jānātyayamābādha evaṃ rūpaścaivaṃ rūpaścetyevamābādhakuśalo bhavati |
V05n746:1288: iha bhiṣak śalyāhartābādhaṃ jānātyayamābādho vātasamuttho vā pittasamuttho vā śleṣmasamuttho vātmopakramiko vā paropakramiko vā sāṃnipātiko vā ṛtupariṇāmiko vetyemābādhasamutthānakuśalo bhavati |
V05n746:1290: iha bhiṣak śalyāhartābādhaṃ jānātyayamābādho'ñjanena vā pratyañjanena vā vamanena vā virecanena bordhvavirecanena bādhovirecanena vā nastakarmaṇā vā dhūpadānena vā svedaparikarmaṇā vā prahāsyatītyevamutpannasyābādhasya prahānakuśalo bhavati |
V05n746:1292: iha bhiṣak śalyāhartābādhaṃ jānātyayamābādha evaṃrūpābhiścaivaṃ rūpābhiśca sāṃpreyābhiḥ kriyābhiḥ kriyamāṇābhiḥ prahīṇa āyatyāṃ notpatsyata ityevaṃ prahīṇasyābādhasyāyatyāmanutpāda kuśalo bhavati |
V05n746:1293: evaṃ caturbhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bhiṣak śalyāhartā rājārhaśca bhavati rājayogyaśca rājāṅgatve ca saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
V05n746:1294: evameva caturaṅgaiḥ samanvāgatastathāgato'rhan samyak saṃbuddho'nuttaro bhisak śalyāhartā ityucyate |
V05n746:1298: idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamidaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ idaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadāryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
V05n746:1299: na khalu jīvaka bhiṣak śalyāhartā jātimūlakānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ prahāṇāya bhaiṣajyaṃ jānāti |
V05n746:1301: tathāgatastu jīvaka jātimūlakānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ prahāṇāya bhaiṣajyaṃ jānāti |
V05n746:1304: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāsyamāṇo jīvakasya kumārabhṛtyasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam |
V05n746:1305: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhṛto dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṃkṣastīrṇavicikitso'parapratyayo'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat |
V05n746:1307: eṣo'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ copāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇagatamabhiprasannam |
V05n746:1308: atha jīvako vaidyarājo bhagavat pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato'ntikāt prakāntaḥ |
V05n746:1309: himavānparvatarājo himasaṃyogānnityaṃ śītalo bhagavataḥ sābhiṣyandaṃ glānamutpannam |
V05n746:1311: svayamevāhaṃ bhagavata upasthānaṃ karomi tadyathā rājñaścakravartina iti |
V05n746:1312: tato jīvakena dvātriṃśadutpalāni sraṃsanīyairdraivyairbhāvayitvā bhagavate dattāni |
V05n746:1324: jīvakaḥ kathayati bhagavan yadyevaṃ guḍaharītakīṃ bhakṣaya |
V05n746:1328: ācaritaṃ jīvakasya yasya kasyacidrājño vā rājamātrasya vā cikitsāṃ karoti sa tasmai grāmaṃ vā grāmavaraṃ vā prayacchati |
V05n746:1329: yāvadapareṇa samayena jīvakena videharājasya vikitsā kṛtā |
V05n746:1332: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n746:1334: ācaritaṃ bhadanta mama yasya rājño vā rājamātrasma vā cikitsāṃ karomi sa me grāmaṃ vā grāmavaraṃ vānuprayacchati |
V05n746:1340: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ vījayan |
V05n746:1342: gṛhāṇānanda śatasahasramūlyaṃ vṛhatikāprāvaraṇaṃ mamārthāya śastralūnaṃ kuruṣveti |
V05n746:1343: tata āyuṣmānānando gṛhītvā vistīrṇāvakāśaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ gatvā māpayitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n746:1345: tatastena bhagavatastricīvaraṃ kṛtamātmanaḥ sāntarottaramayuṣmataśca rāhulasya kusūlakaḥ |
V05n746:1346: taṃ khalu varṣāvāsaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcapaṭaśatāni saṃpannāni |

V05n746:2091: tato rājñā hālāhalena viṣeṇa ca sahayogena vihvalīkṛtāḥ |
V05n746:2093: tataḥ peḍāṃ pūrayitvā jyeṣṭhaputrasya śira upari dattvā jatumudrayā lakṣayitvā viśākhāyāḥ preṣitāḥ |
V05n746:2097: tataḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena pūrvavadyāvad bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ peḍāmuddhāṭayitumārabdhā |
V05n746:2099: sacedviśākhā adṛṣṭasatyā putrabadhaṃ drakṣyati sthānametadvidyate yatsatyānāmabhājanī bhaviṣyatīti viditvā viśākhāmāha |
V05n746:2103: tato bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā pūrvavadyāvat satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n746:2104: tato dṛṣṭasatyā sā peḍāmuddhiṭitvā paśyati putraśirāṃsi |
V05n746:2108: haṃ bho bhikṣavo rājā prasenajitkosalo yena viśākhāyāḥ putrāḥ praghātitāḥ |
V05n746:2110: ebhireva sahāyaiḥ kṛtsnā tena vasumatī karatale sthāpitā syāditi |
V05n746:2111: atha rājā prasenajitkosalo rajasāvacūrṇitagātro yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n746:2112: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n746:2115: yāni tāni bhadanta rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadairśvaryasthā (ma)
V05n746:2116: vīryamanuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthagbhavanti rājakṛtyāni rājakaraṇīyāni tānyahaṃ kṛtvā pariprāpya etarhyāgacchāmi rajasāvacūrṇiṃtagātraḥ |
V05n746:2119: tadyathā mahārāja iha te pūrvasyāṃ diśi puruṣa āgacchecchraddhitaḥ pratyayitaḥ stheya avisaṃvādito lokasya |
V05n746:2123: mahāśailaṃ parvatamakhaṇḍamachidramasuṣiraṃ susaṃvṛttamekaghanaṃ yāvacca pṛthivī yāvacca nabho'trāntare sarvānsattvānsarvānprāṇinaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni sarvaṃ ca tṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāparṇaśadamabhiniṣpeṣayannāgacchati |
V05n746:2124: yatte deva kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tatkuruṣveti |
V05n746:2125: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyāmutarasyāṃ diśi puruṣa āgacchet |
V05n746:2127: evaṃ bhūpate mahārāja mahati mahābhaye pratyupasthite dāruṇe puruṣasaṃkṣaye durlabhemanuṣyapratilaṃbhe kiṃ syāt karaṇīyam |
V05n746:2128: evaṃ rūpe me bhadanta mahati mahābhaye pratyupasthite dāruṇe puruṣasaṃkṣaye durlabhe manuṣyapratilaṃbhe kiṃ syātkaraṇīyaṃ nānyatrārthacaryāyāṃ dharmacaryāyāṃ puṇyacaryāyāṃ kuśalacaryāyāṃ kalyāṇacaryāyāṃ buddhānāṃ ca śāsane yogamāpattum |
V05n746:2130: evaṃ rūpe me mahati mahābhaye pūrvavadyāvatbuddhānāṃ śāsane yogamāpattumiti |
V05n746:2131: yāni tāni bhadanta rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryastha (ma)
V05n746:2132: vīryamanuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthagbhavanti hastibhirhasti yuddhānyaśvairaśvayuddhāni rathai rathayuddhāni pattibhiḥ pattiyuddhāni mantrairmantrayuddhāni dhanairdhanayuddhāni |
V05n746:2135: evaṃ rūpe me bhadanta mahati mahābhaye pratyupasthite pūrvavadyāvadbuddhānāṃ śāsane yogamāpattumiti |
V05n746:2136: evameva mahārāja satatasamitamabhimardata eva prāṇino jarāmaraṇam |
V05n746:2137: evaṃ jarāmaraṇābhimardanena mahārāja puruṣapudgalena kiñcitsyātkaraṇīyaṃ nānyatrārthacaryāyāḥ pūrvavadyāvadbuddhānāṃ śāsane yogamāpattumiti viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n746:2138: yathā mahānto vipulā nabha āsādya parvatāḥ |
V05n746:2141: na cāpi mantrayuddhena jayo labhyo dhanena vā ||8 ||
V05n746:2149: sa dharmacārī kāyena vācā vāpyatha cetasā |
V05n746:2150: iha cānindito bhavati pretya svarge va modate ||12 ||
V05n746:2151: atha rājā prasenajitkosalo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanātprakrāntaḥ |
V05n746:2152: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayachettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n746:2153: kiṃ bhadanta viśākhayā mṛgāramātrā karma kṛtam |
V05n746:2155: tena dvātriṃśatputrā jātā vyāḍā vikrāntāḥ saṃvṛttā iti |
V05n746:2158: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāmanyatamo gṛhapatiḥ putraḥ kālagataḥ |
V05n746:2160: yadā bhagavān kāśyapaḥ samyak saṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛttvā indhanakṣayādivāgnirnirupādhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛttaḥ |
V05n746:2161: tasmiṃśca samaye vārāṇasyāṃ kṛkirnāma rājā babhūva |
V05n746:2162: tena bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya catūratnamayastūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ |
V05n746:2163: tatra yā sā aputrā yuvatiḥ putrābhinandinī sā vṛddhā saṃvṛttā |
V05n746:2165: tayā chandakabhikṣaṇa kṛtvā tasmin stūpe pūjā kṛtā praṇidhānaṃ ca |
V05n746:2168: anena mama kuśalamūlena bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyuriti kṛtvā prakrāntā nagaraṃ praviṣṭā tatrānyatarā strī prasūyamānā duḥkhavedanābhyāhatā virauti |
V05n746:2173: yadyahaṃ prasūtā bhaveyamahamapyevaṃvidhaṃ dukhamanubhaveyam yāvat punarapi dvātriṃśatā goṣṭhikaistasminstūpe pūjā kṛtā |
V05n746:2179: te kathayanti amba idaṃ cedaṃ ca |
V05n746:2186: sā tāvatstrī ekavāraṃ prasūyamānā duḥkhavedanābhyāhatā tathā virauti ahaṃ punardvātriṃśadvārān prasūyamānā kathaṃ kariṣyāmi iti |
V05n746:2189: sā muhūrtamātreṇa dvātriṃśadaṇḍāni prasūtā na ca virauti |
V05n746:2191: ayaṃ śobhanaprasavanopāya iti viditvā tasmin stūpe tīvreṇa prasānena nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā yatheyaṃ kukkuṭī muhūrtamātreṇa dvātriṃśadaṇḍāni prasūtā evameva ahamapi sakṛda dvātriṃśadaṇḍāni prasūyeyeti |
V05n746:2193: yā sā vṛddhā yuvatireṣaiva sā viśākhā |
V05n746:2194: tena kālena tena samayena ye te dvātriṃśad goṣṭhikā eta eva te dvāriṃśad viśākhāputrāḥ |
V05n746:2195: yadanayā tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena dvātriṃśadaṇḍāni prasūtāni |
V05n746:2196: kiṃ bhadantaṃ viśākhāputraiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena aduṣyanapakāriṇo rājñā prasenajitā praghātitāḥ |
V05n746:2197: teṣāṃ ca śirāṃsi peḍāyāṃ prakṣipya viśākhāyā upanāmitāni |
V05n746:2199: ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pūrvavadyāvat phalanti khalu dehinām |
V05n746:2216: tatropapadye'haṃ yatraiṣāṃ śirāṃsi chittvā peḍāyāṃ pūrayitvā etasyāṃ preṣayeyamiti |
V05n746:2218: yo'sau vṛṣa eṣa evāsau rājā prasenajitkosalaḥ tena kālena tena samayena |
V05n746:2219: ye te caurā eta eva te viśākhāputrāḥ |
V05n746:2220: yā sā śauṇḍika patnī eṣaiva sā viśākhā tena kālena tena samayena (iti) vistaraḥ |
V05n746:2223: tena tasminparyaṭatā āśramapadasya nātidūre ciṃkhale bhūpradeśe prasrāvaḥ kṛtaḥ |
V05n746:2225: tayāsau tṛṣṇārtayā pītaḥ strīndriyaṃ ca ghrātam |
V05n746:2228: yāvadapareṇa samayena tasminneva pradeśe āgatya prasūtā |
V05n746:2230: sā taṃ ghrātvā visabhāgasattva iti corayitvā prakrāntā |
V05n746:2231: yāvattena ṛṣiṇā tadāśramaṃ paryaṭatā sa dārako dṛṣṭaḥ |
V05n746:2232: sa samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ kasyāyaṃ putra iti |
V05n746:2235: tasya mṛgasya yādṛśaṃ śiraṃ iti mṛgaśiro mṛgaśira iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā |
V05n746:2239: yadi tāvatkhaṃkhaṭasvaro bhavati ūrdhvagāmī bhavati devopapattiṃ vyākaroti |
V05n746:2240: atha madhyobhavati ūrdhvagāmī bhavati manuṣyopapattiṃ vyākaroti |
V05n746:2243: yadi tāvadgadgadasvaro bhavati adhogāmībhavati narakopapattiṃ vyākaroti |
V05n746:2244: atha madhyasvaro bhavati adhogāmī bhavati tiryagupapattim |
V05n746:2246: tato bhagavatā tasya vinayakālaṃ jñātvā āyuṣmānānanda uktaḥ |
V05n746:2247: gacchānanda catvāri śirāṃsyādhāya srota āpannasya sakṛdāgāmino'nāgāmino'rhataśceti |
V05n746:2249: catvāri śirāṃsyādhāya tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ |
V05n746:2251: sa srota āpannasyeti kapālamākoṭya kathayatyayaṃ deveṣupapannaḥ |
V05n746:2254: arhataḥ kapālamākoṭya viṣayaṃ na jānāti na vijānāti |
V05n746:2258: kiṃ vā nimittāni na tādṛśāni yenāsya na jānāmi taṃ hi pracāram |
V05n746:2260: na sarvavidyāsu kṛtaśramastvaṃ yenāsya jānāsi taṃ hi pracāram adhīṣva ttāvannikhilāṃ vidyām lokasya paścādvayapadekṣyasi tvamiti |
V05n746:2269: śiṣṭaṃ nopalabhe ca sattvacaritaṃ vidyāparādhe sati |
V05n746:2271: kiṃ tatsarvaparapravādivijaya śiṣṭaṃ na vijñāyate ||13 || iti ||
V05n746:2276: prajñaptaṃ vā gatirnāsti prāptānāmacalaṃ padam ||14 || iti ||
V05n746:2278: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyamahaṃ bhagavato'ntike brahmacaryamiti |
V05n746:2280: pravrājyopasaṃpādya yathābhiramyaṃ rājagṛhe bihṛtya yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ |
V05n746:2301: iti hi mṛgaśiro nakṣatrāṇi capalāni caṃcalānyanavasthāyīni |
V05n746:2308: aśraṣīdviśākhā mṛgāramātā bhagavān kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharatyasmākamevārāma iti |
V05n746:2310: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇā |
V05n746:2311: ekānte niṣaṇṇāṃ viśākhāṃ mṛgāramātaraṃ bhagavāndharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati pūrvavadyāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
V05n746:2312: atha viśākhā mṛgāramātā utthāyāsanādyena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat |
V05n746:2313: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti |
V05n746:2317: yāvadasau preṣyadārikā pūrvārāmaṃ gatvā paśyati bhikṣūn kavāṭa vivareṇa nagnānsnāyinaḥ |
V05n746:2328: samayo bhadanta sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasye dānīṃ bhagavānkālaṃ manyata iti pūrvavadyāvad bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātram |
V05n746:2331: āgantuke dānaṃ gamike dānaṃ glāne dānaṃ glānopasthāyike dānaṃ dhruvaṃ yuvāguṃ dhruvaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ codakaśāṭikāmiti |
V05n746:2333: kiṃ punastad viśākhe ānuśaṃsaṃ samanupabhyantī āgantuke dānaṃ dadāsi |
V05n746:2334: āgantuko bhadanda bhikṣurna gocarakuśalo bhavati na vīthīkuśalaḥ |
V05n746:2335: sa madīyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya gocarakuśalo bhaviṣyati vīthī kuśalaśca |
V05n746:2338: gamiko bhadanta bhikṣuḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ sārthātparibhṛśyate |
V05n746:2340: sa madīyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya sārthānna paribhṛśyate |
V05n746:2344: glāno bhadanta bhikṣuḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ klāmedvā kālaṃ va kuryāt |
V05n746:2349: glānopasthāyiko bhadanta bhikṣurātmārthaṃ piṇḍakaṃ paryeṣamāṇo glānasya kṛtyaṃ hāpayati |
V05n746:2353: santi bhadanta bhagavataḥ śrāvakā dīptāgnayo mandāgnayaśca |
V05n746:2354: tatra ye mandāgnayasteṣāmagnisaṃrakṣaṇaṃ ye tu dīptāgnayasteṣāṃ valopacayaḥ |
V05n746:2360: ye tvalpābādhāste parimujya bhūyasyā mātrayā sukhasparśaṃ vihariṣyanti |
V05n746:2362: kimarthavaśaṃ samanupaśyantī bhikṣuṇāṃ varṣāśāṭī cīvaraṃ dadāsi |
V05n746:2363: adyaiva mayā bhadanta preṣyadārikā kālārocikā preṣitā |
V05n746:2370: eko'yaṃ bhadanta samayaḥ saṃbahulāśca bhikṣuṇyo'jiravatyāṃ nagnāḥ snānti |
V05n746:2371: tā gṛhiṇyo vipuṣpya vipuṣpya bhikṣuṇīnāmaṅgulyagreṇa guhyasthānānyupadarśayanti |
V05n746:2373: madīyayā tu udaka śāṭikayā tā guptāḥ snāsyanti |
V05n746:2374: sādhu sādhu viśākhe yāni tvayā aṣṭau puṇyakriyāvastūni samākhyātāni saṃdṛśyante etāni |
V05n746:2378: labhyaṃ puṇyasya pramāṇamudrahītumetāvatpuṇyaṃ vā puṇyaphalaṃ vā puṇyaphalavipāki veti |
V05n746:2379: apitu bahutvāt puṇyasya mahāpuṇyaḥ puṇyaskandha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
V05n746:2381: amuko bhikṣuḥ sa bhagavatā pratipadyeva vyākṛtaḥ |
V05n746:2382: eṣo'pi bhikṣustrayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srota āpanno bhavatyavinipātadharmo niyataṃ saṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ saptakṛtvo bhavaparamāḥ saptakṛtvo devāṃśca saṃghāyya saṃsṛtya duḥkhasyāntaṃ karisyatīti |
V05n746:2386: śrutvā ca punaradhigamiṣyāmi prītiprāmodyamudāraṃ kuśalaṃ naiṣkramyopasaṃhitam |
V05n746:2388: eṣa bhikṣustrayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādrāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tanutvātsakṛdāgāmī bhaviṣyati |
V05n746:2391: sa madīyamāgantukabhaktaṃ pūrvavadyāvat varṣāśāṭūīcīvaram bhikṣuṇī codakaśāṭikāmiti |
V05n746:2392: śrutvā ca punaradhigamiṣyāmi prītiprāmodyamudāraṃ kuśalaṃ naiṣkramyopasaṃhitam |
V05n746:2394: eṣa bhikṣūḥ paṃcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādanāgāmi bhaviṣyatyanāgantā punarimaṃ lokamiti |
V05n746:2397: śrutvā ca punaradhigamiṣyāmi protiprāmodyamudāraṃ kuśalaṃ naiṣkramyopasaṃhitam |
V05n746:2399: eṣa bhikṣuḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau pravekṣyatīti |
V05n746:2403: atha bhagavān viśākhāṃ mṛgāramātaraṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanātprakrāntaḥ |
V05n746:2408: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
V05n746:2409: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulā bhikṣava ārāmadvāre aśucimrakṣitāni śayanāsanāni śocayantyātāpayanti praviṣajanti |
V05n746:2410: adrākṣīdbhagavān saṃbahulānbhikṣūn ārāmadvāre aśucimrakṣitāni śayanāsanāni śocayata ātapayataḥ praviṣajataḥ |
V05n746:2412: yadapi śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ prapīḍya prapīḍyatvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitaṃ dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti tadapi bhikṣavo mātrayā pratisaṃkhyāya paribhujanta iti viditvā vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmayya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ prāvikṣat pratisaṃlayanāya |
V05n746:2413: atha bhagavān sāyāhne pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n746:2415: ihāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣam |
V05n746:2416: adrākṣamahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ saṃbahulānbhikṣūnārāmadvāre aśucimrakṣitāni śayanāsanāni śocayata ātapayataḥ praviṣajataḥ |
V05n746:2418: yadapi śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ prapīḍya prapīdya tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitaṃ dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti tadapi bhikṣavo mātrayā pratisaṃkhyāya paribhuñjate |
V05n746:2419: sādhu bhikṣavaḥ śraddhādeyasya mātrā paribhojitāyāḥ kāla (pari)
V05n746:2421: atha bhagavāñchraddhādeyasya mātrādiparibhojitānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā bhikṣūṇāmantrayate sma |
V05n746:2422: tasmāttarhi bhikṣavo na vinā pratyāstaraṇena sāṃdhikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ paribhoktavyamaśucimrakṣitaṃ śayanāsanaṃ ca |
V05n746:2424: atha bhagavānpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣadāyuṣmatānandena paścācchramaṇena |
V05n746:2429: eṣa ānanda puruṣaḥ kāśyapasya samyak saṃbuddhasya pravacane pravrajita āsīt |
V05n746:2430: tatrānena sāṃdhikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ kalyapratyāstaraṇena malapratyāstaraṇena paṭṭikāṃ surucikāṃ loḍhakaṃ kṛtvā paribhuktam |
V05n746:2431: tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañcajanmaśatāni kālakapṛṣṭho jātaḥ |
V05n746:2433: viditvā vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pūrvavadyāvatpratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n746:2435: adyāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ |
V05n746:2437: sa kāśyapasya samyak saṃbuddhasya pravacane bhikṣurāsīt |
V05n746:2438: tatrānena sāṃdhikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ kalpapratyāstaraṇena pūrvavadyāvatpañca janmaśatāni kālaka pṛṣṭho jātaḥ |
V05n746:2439: tasmāttarhi bhikṣavodyāgreṇa na bhikṣuṇā kalpapratyāstaraṇena sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ paribhoktavyam |
V05n746:2442: api tu dvābhyāṃ pratyāstaraṇābhyāṃ paribhoktavyaṃ ghanena vā ekapuṭena |
V05n746:2447: nīlaṃ kardamaṃ kaṣāyaṃ vā pratyāstaraṇam śastralūnaṃ kṛtvā dhārayitavyam |
V05n746:2462: prāsādeṣu puṣkariṇyāṃ dvārakoṣṭhake pariṣaṇḍāyāṃ caṃkrameṣu saṃsthānavṛkṣeṣu tiṣṭhanti |
V05n746:2463: durgandhāna makṣikābhirākīrṇān tāndṛṣṭvā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo'vadhyāyanti kṣipanti vivācayanti |
V05n746:2467: kuṣṭharogābhibhūtena bhikṣuṇā sāṃdhikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ laya naṃ ca na paribhoktavyam |
V05n746:2469: sāṃdhikī prasrāvakuṭī varcaḥkuṭīḥ ca na praveṣṭavyā |
V05n746:2470: pratigupte sthāne saṃghena tasya vāso devaḥ |
V05n746:2472: kuṣṭharogābhibhūto bhikṣuryathāprajñaptānāsamudācārikāndharmānna samādāya vartate saṃgho vā sātisāro bhavati |
V05n746:2476: labhyaṃ bhadanta kauśeyaṃ cīvaraṃ tricīvarādhīṣṭhānena atirekacīvarādhiṣṭhānena dhārayitum |
V05n746:2483: upasaṃkramya bhagvataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte asthāt |
V05n746:2487: tīrthikadhvaja eṣa mohapuruṣaḥ yaduta bhāṅgeya cīvaram |
V05n746:2500: api tu tricīvaraṃ mayānujñātaṃ kimarthaṃ nāgnyaṃ samādadāsi |
V05n746:2504: atha sa bhikṣurnāgnyamalabhamānaḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hānāyāvṛttaḥ bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n746:2505: paśya bhadantāsau bhikṣurnāgnyamalabhamānaḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāta hānāyāvṛttaḥ |
V05n746:2507: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte'pyadhvani ahrīkyadoṣād dārikāṃ na labdhavāṃstacchrūyatām |
V05n746:2508: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dhṛtarāṣṭro nāma haṃsarājo babhūva |
V05n746:2525: sa śrutvā mayūro dhṛtarāṣṭrasakāśaṃ gatvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n746:2526: svaro manojño ruciraśca varṇo vyāmapramāṇāni ca varhakāṇi |
V05n746:2527: grīvā ca vaidūryamaṇeḥ samānā dadāsi kasmānna bhavān sutāṃ me ||17 ||
V05n746:2529: svaro manojño ruciraśca varṇo vyāmapramāṇāni ca varhakāṇi |
V05n746:2530: grīvā ca vaidūryamaṇeḥ samānā ahrīkyadoṣāttu na te dadāmi ||18 || iti ||
V05n746:2532: yo'sau mayūraḥ eṣa evāsau bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena |
V05n746:2533: tadāpyeṣa ahrīkyadoṣād dārikāmalabhamāno duḥkhī durmanā pakṣigaṇamadhyādavakrāntaḥ |
V05n746:2574: āgārikā hyenaṃ dhārayanti tasmānna bhikṣuṇā sarvanīlaṃ cīvaraṃ dhārayitavyam |
V05n746:2587: tīrthikadhvaja eṣa mohapuruṣa pūrvavadyāvat sārisāro bhavati |
V05n746:2591: āgārikadhvaja eṣa mohapurusaḥ pūrvavadyāvat sātisāro bhavati |
V05n746:2595: āgārikadhvaja eṣa mohapuruṣaḥ pūrvavadyāvat sātisāri bhavati |
V05n746:2599: āgārikadhvaja eṣa mohapuruṣaḥ pūrvavadyāvat sātisāro bhavati |
V05n746:2608: āyuṣmān plīhakānandaḥ anyatamasminnabhikṣuke āvāse akavāṭake varṣā upagataḥ |
V05n746:2611: na bhikṣuṇā abhikṣuke āvāse akavāṭake varṣā upagantavyam |
V05n746:2612: na ca vinā saṃghāṭyā kkacid gantavyā |
V05n746:2631: uktaṃ bhagavatā bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvarapāto deya iti |
V05n746:2632: bhikṣavaḥ saṃghapravārita eva janapade cārikāṃ prakrāmanti |
V05n746:2642: apare'pi bhikṣavaḥ avalokitā api pratijñāya na gṛhṇanti |
V05n746:2666: tatra yadi bhikṣuśataṃ prativasati paṭakaśataṃ dadāti |
V05n746:2667: evaṃ yāvadeko'pi bhikṣuḥ prativasati paṭakaśatameva dadāti |
V05n746:2668: yāvadapareṇa samayena tasminneva vihāre dvau mahallau varṣoṣitau |
V05n746:2671: ekaḥ kathayati saṃghasyāyaṃ lābhaḥ pratipadyata iti |
V05n746:2688: na śakyamevam yo navakaḥ sa gacchatu yo vṛddhaḥ sa vastrāṇi gopāyatu |
V05n746:2694: tenāsau dūrata eva dṛṣṭo bakākāraśirāḥ pralambabhrūḥ |
V05n746:2725: tataḥ sa rātramevotthāya sālohitamādāya tvaritatvaritaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n746:2727: tatastena dvitīyena sālohitena vihārasthena svāgatavādasamudācāreṇa samudācarya viśrāmitaḥ |
V05n746:2728: atha trayo'pi janā ekasmin sthāne niṣaṇṇāḥ |
V05n746:2745: tatastayordhruvapracāraṃ kalpakāraṃ pṛṣṭvā ekasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya pṛcchati |
V05n746:2747: sthavira nityaṃ mayā vihāraḥ siktaḥ saṃmṛṣṭaḥ sukumārī gomayakārṣī datteti |
V05n746:2748: sālohita yadi secanena saṃmārjanena vā lābho labhyeta upanandaḥ sarvavihārānsiñcet saṃmārjayecca |
V05n746:2749: api tu yo'tra lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ sa tasyānyasya sālohitasyānubhāvāt |
V05n746:2761: sālohita yadi dharmaśravaṇena lābho labhyeta upanandastiṣṭhan gacchanniṣaṇṇo nipannaḥ sarvakālaṃ dharmaṃ deśayet |
V05n746:2762: yaḥ kaścidayaṃ lābhaḥ sampannaḥ sarvo'sau tasyānyasya sālohitasyāmubhāvāt |
V05n746:2763: tenāyaṃ vihāro nityakālaṃ siktaḥ saṃmṛṣṭaḥ sukumārī gomayakārṣītu pradattā |
V05n746:2770: kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svargaloke devaṣupapadyata iti |
V05n746:2775: yamasau dadāti sa grahītavyo no tu vicārayitavya iti |
V05n746:2784: dvayorbhāgayormadhye svayaṃ niṣaṇṇaḥ tayordvayormadhye ekaṃ bhāgaṃ sthāpayitvā jñaptiṃ kartumārabdhaḥ |
V05n746:2790: tatu dvau bhāgāvātmanā gṛhītvā tayoreko dattaḥ |
V05n746:2803: amitrāṇāṃ pādaṃ gale dattvā etatprakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti |
V05n746:2805: yaḥ kaścidādīnavo bhikṣavaḥ parakīye lābhe sannipatati |
V05n746:2809: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchetāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti |
V05n746:2810: paśya bhadanta āyuṣmatā upanandena tanmahalladvayaṃ dharmamukhikayā vyaṃsitam |
V05n746:2812: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte'pyadhvanyanena mahalladvayaṃ vyaṃsitam |
V05n746:2815: tadyada jalena gacchati tadā matsyāḥ sthalamabhiruhanti |
V05n746:2816: yadā tu sthalena gacchati tadā matsyāḥ jale nipatanti |
V05n746:2822: tatra ye jalasthena matsyāḥ saṃtrāsitāḥ sthalamabhirohanti |
V05n746:2830: mā me pratyavāyaḥ syāt so'pi kathayati |
V05n746:2846: ye mayā jalena gacchatā matsyāḥ santrāsitāḥ sthalamabhirūḍhāḥ te anena praghātitāḥ bhāgineya yadi jalagamanena kiñcitsampadyeta pūrṇamukho nityaṃ jalena yāyāt |
V05n746:2847: tasya sthalena gacchatā sthāṇubhayaṃ kaṇṭakabhayaṃ śvāpadabhayaṃ kūlapātabhayam |
V05n746:2848: apituṃ yadyasau na pratighātayati kiṃ tvaṃ trāsayitvā karoṣi |
V05n746:2849: sarvathā ye'tra matsyāḥ sampannāste tasyānu bhāvānna tava |
V05n746:2850: yadasau dadāti sa grahītavyo no tu vicārayitavyaḥ |
V05n746:2855: mātulo'haṃ sthalena gato mayā sthalamabhirūḍhā matsyāḥ pratighātitāḥ |
V05n746:2856: bhāgineya yadi sthalagamanena kiñcillabhyeta pūrṇamukho nityameva sthalena yāyāt |
V05n746:2857: tasya jalena gacchatā ūrmibhayaṃ kūrmabhayaṃ śiśumārabhayaṃ kumbhīrabhayaṃ jālabhayam |
V05n746:2858: api tu yadyasau na santrāsayati kathaṃ tvaṃ praghātayasi |
V05n746:2859: sarvathā ye tu matsyāḥ sampannāste tasyānubhāvāt |
V05n746:2860: yadasau dadāti sa grahītavyo no tu vicārayitavyaḥ |
V05n746:2873: yastu madhyamako gaṇḍaḥ dharmasthastaṃ hariṣyati ||21 || iti ||
V05n746:2877: sa mahato rohitasya matyasya madhyagaṇḍamādāya pituḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n746:2879: kutastvaṃ pūrṇika eṣi kuta eṣi supūrṇika |
V05n746:2887: tvaṃ ca lābhena saṃyuktastau cāpi paritoṣitau ||24 || iti ||
V05n746:2889: yo'sau pūrṇamukhaḥ śṛgālaḥ eṣa evāsau upanandaḥ |
V05n746:2890: tena kālena tena samayena yau tāvudrāvetau tau mahallau |
V05n746:2899: amuko gṛhapatirbhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā pratyekamekaikaṃ bhikṣuṃ paṭenācchādayiṣyatīti |
V05n746:2901: na bhavāmyupanando yadi tasmātpaṭakaṃ na niṣpādayāmīti |
V05n746:2916: yaḥ kaścidādīnavo bhikṣavo'nimantritāḥ parakīye lābhe sannipatanti |
V05n746:2922: paśya bhadanta āyuṣmānupanando'nimantrita eva parakīye lābhe saṃnipatita iti |
V05n746:2932: sa prathamataraṃ vṛddhānte bhuktvā paṭamādāya prakrāntaḥ |
V05n746:2940: api tu tvayā vṛddho brāhmaṇa upanimantritaḥ |
V05n746:2946: yo'sau brāhmaṇo vṛddhaḥ eṣa evāsāvupanandastena kālena tena samayena |
V05n746:2954: pratipattyevāsau vihāraḥ śobhane viviktāvakāśe ca bhūbhāge pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ nānāvṛkṣopaśobhite haṃsakrauñcamayūrakasārikākokilābhinikūjite vividhapuṣpaphalopaśobhite |
V05n746:2956: tena tāṃ vihāraśobhāmupavanaśobhāṃ ca dṛṣṭvābhiprasannenādṛṣṭvaiva bhikṣusaṃghamuddiśya prabhūto lābhaḥ preṣitaḥ |
V05n746:2958: sa bhikṣuḥ kaukṛtikaḥ saṃghasyāyaṃ lābha iti kaukṛtyā na gṛhṇāti |
V05n746:2962: gomayagṛhamapi cedbhikṣurniśṛtya varṣā upagato bhavati tatra cedbrāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ |
V05n746:2963: saṃghamuddiśaya lābhamanuprayacchantyalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā yastatra vasati eko vā dvau vā saṃbahulā vā teṣāmeva saḥ |
V05n746:2967: saṃghasya cīvaraṃ caiva aṣṭau lābhena kārayet ||25 ||
V05n746:2968: śrāvastyāṃ nidānam āyuṣmānudālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati |
V05n746:2976: antarvarṣe bhadanta bhikṣuḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hānāyāvartate |
V05n746:2982: antarvarṣe bhadanta bhikṣuḥ kālaḥ kālaḥ kuryāt |
V05n746:2989: āyuṣmāṃśca śāriputro janapadacārikāṃ caran taṃ vihāramanuprāptaḥ |
V05n746:2991: sa tāni paṃcapaṭakaśatāni tasminneva vihāre dattvā prakrāntaḥ |
V05n746:2992: yāvattasya dvau sārdhaṃ vihāriṇau ṛṣila ṛṣidattaśca janapadacārikāṃ carantau tameva karvaṭakamanuprāptau |
V05n746:2993: tāvapi tena gṛhapatinā bhojayitvā paṃcabhiḥ paṭaśatairācchāditau |
V05n746:2995: āyuṣmantau yuvayorupādhyāyena tasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśātpañcapaṭaśatāni labdhāni |
V05n746:3017: tannivāsino bhikṣavaḥ kadāciddhi ekapoṣadhena varṣā upagacchanti |
V05n746:3018: tatra yo lābhaḥ saṃpadyate yamasminneva vihāre dattastasminnivāsibhireva bhikṣubhiḥ paribhoktavyaṃ hi |
V05n746:3021: yathāpi tadbhikṣava idamevaṃ rūpaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā varṣā upagacchanti |
V05n746:3025: te cedbrāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ upagatakānāmāvāsī upagatakānupagatakānbhikṣūnbhojayitvā upagatakānāṃ lābhamanuprayacchanti |
V05n746:3072: sacette brāhmaṇa gṛhapatayaḥ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu upagatakānupagatakānbhikṣūnbhojayitvā upagatakānāṃ lābhamanuprayacchanti |
V05n746:3111: bhikṣuryaṃ strīpuruṣapaṃḍakamupaniśritya varṣā upagacchati sa yaṃ lābhaṃ dadāti tasyaiva saḥ |
V05n746:3118: layane maṭhe vā kūṭāgāre vā prajñaptaḥ |
V05n746:3119: tatra yo bhikṣu prativasati tasyaiva saḥ |
V05n746:3122: yo lābho varṣoṣitasya bhikṣusaṃghasya dāyikaiḥ prajñaptaḥ |
V05n746:3128: yo lābho jāto bodhau dharmacakre parinirvāṇe niryātitaḥ |
V05n746:3129: sa cenna śakyate caturmahācaityeṣu ekasminneva mahācaitye deyo nānyatra |
V05n746:3136: yathāpi tadbhadanta ekasminnāvāse saṃbahulā utkṣiptakāḥ saṃbahulāśca prakṛtisthakāḥ prativasanti |
V05n746:3151: yathāpi tadbhadanta ekasminnāvāse saṃbahulā utkṣiptakāḥ saṃbahulāśca prakṛsthakāḥ prativasanti |
V05n746:3165: utkṣiptakānāṃ yaḥ prathamaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ pratinisṛjati ||3 ||
V05n746:3166: upagatakānāmāvāse anupagatakaḥ śrāmaṇeraka āgatya kālaṃ karoti |
V05n746:3179: upagatakānāmāvāse anupagatakaḥ śrāmaṇeraka āgatya evaṃ vadedosārayantu māmāyuṣmantaḥ |
V05n746:3221: anupagatakānāmāvāse upagatakaḥ śrāmaṇeta āgatya kālaṃ kuryāt |
V05n746:3233: anupagatakānāmāvāse upagatakaḥ śrāmaṇera āgatyaivaṃ vadedosārayantu māmāyuṣmantaḥ |
V05n746:3281: bhadramukha bhaiṣajyaṃ me vyapadiśeti sa kathayati ārya ghṛtasya pānaṃ piba |
V05n746:3284: sa cedadyaiva pāsyāmi adyaiva svastho bhaviṣyami |
V05n746:3285: śvaḥ katareṇa kalpena ghṛtaṃ samādhāpayiṣyāmi vastrāṇi vā |
V05n746:3289: taiḥ prabhūtā ghṛtaghaṭakā vastrāṇi ca vraṇabandhanāya samādhāpitāni |
V05n746:3295: adya dviguṇaṃ pibeti sārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsina uktā |
V05n746:3299: prabhūtaṃ ghṛtaṃ vastrāni ca varṇabandhanāni samādhāpayateti |
V05n746:3300: tai prabhūtataraṃ ghṛtaṃ vastrāṇi ca samādhāpitāni |
V05n746:3301: tenātilobhāt śvaḥ kalpo bhaviṣyatīti tadapi divase na pītam |
V05n746:3310: ārya yadi ghṛtamañjūṣāyāmapi nimagnastiṣṭhasi tathāpi te nāsti jāivitamiti |
V05n746:3313: gale te pādaṃ dattvā ghṛtaṃ ca pibāmi |
V05n746:3315: sa vaidyo humiti kṛtvā sāmarṣaḥ prakrāntaḥ |
V05n746:3316: tata upanandena ghṛtasya pātraṃ pūrayitvā pītam |
V05n746:3338: yasmin mahārāja samaye tava rājakaraṇīyaṃ bhavati |
V05n746:3339: avalokayasi tvaṃ tasmin samaye upanandaṃ bhikṣum |
V05n746:3340: yasmin vā te samaye āvāho vā vivāho vā avalokayasi tasmin samaye upanandam |
V05n746:3341: kadācid vā te upanando yāvajjīvaṃ pravāritaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ |
V05n746:3350: evaṃ bhadanta ityāyuṣmānānando bhagavato pratiśrutya yena rājā prasenajit kośalastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n746:3355: tat āyuṣmatānandena rājñaḥ pratisandeśo bhagavate niveditaḥ |
V05n746:3361: tasya prabhūtaṃ suvarṇa tisraḥ suvarṇalakṣā bhikṣubhirbhājitā iti |
V05n746:3365: bhikṣubhiḥ pātayitvā taiḥ sārdhaṃ punarapi bhājitaḥ |
V05n746:3369: pātayanto bhājayantaśca riñcantyuddeśaṃ ṣāṭhaṃ svādhyāyaṃ yogaṃ manasikāram |
V05n746:3374: gaṇḍī tridaṇḍakaṃ caityaṃ śīlākā jñaptiḥ pañcakam |
V05n746:3376: evaṃ tridaṇḍake bhāṣyamāṇe caityavandanāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyām śīlākā(yāmā)
V05n746:3378: tasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ sarvaṃ mṛtapariṣkāraṃ jñaptiṃ kṛtvā bhājayitavyam |
V05n746:3381: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā pūrvavad yāvatsarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite mṛtapariṣkāraṃ vṛddhānte sthāpayitvā ekena bhikṣuṇā vṛddhānte niṣaṇṇena jñaptiḥ kartavyā |
V05n746:3383: asminnāvāse upanando bhikṣuḥ kālagataḥ tasyedaṃ mṛtapariṣkāraṃ dṛśyamadṛśyaṃ cāvatiṣṭhate |
V05n746:3384: sa cetsaṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yatsaṃgha upanandasya bhikṣormṛtadravyaṃ dṛśyamadṛśyaṃ ca mṛtapariṣkārikamadhitiṣṭhedityeṣātra jñaptiḥ |
V05n746:3385: eṣā bhikṣavo mṛtapariṣkāra vibhāganiṣṭhā yaduta jñaptiḥ |
V05n746:3386: jñaptau kṛtāyāṃ yo bhikṣurāgacchati lābho na deya iti |
V05n746:3388: yatra yatra bhadanta saṃghavṛttaḥ jñaptikārako nāsti tatra mṛtapariṣkārikaṃ bhājayitavyam |
V05n746:3393: ekaṃ pariṣkāraṃ vikrīya tataḥ stokaṃ saṃghavṛddhāya saṃghanavakāya ca dattvā yatheṣṭaṃ bhājayitavyam |
V05n746:3395: jñaptau ca kṛtāyām pūrvācarame vā mṛtapariṣkāriko lābhaḥ sarvabuddhaśiṣyebhyaḥ prāpadyata iti |
V05n746:3396: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n746:3399: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte'pyadhvani atilobhena vipannaḥ |
V05n746:3401: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo'nyatamena lubdhena hastī saviśeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ |
V05n746:3402: tatastena marmavedanābhyāhatena śarānusāreṇa gatvā sa lubdho jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ |
V05n746:3404: pañcamātrāṇi cauraśatānyanyatamaṃ karvaṭakaṃ muṣitvā taṃ pradeśamanuprāptāni |
V05n746:3409: ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni hastinaṃ viśasya māṃsaṃ pacantu |
V05n746:3411: tatra ye viśasanti pacanti ca teṣāmetadabhavat |
V05n746:3414: yāvadāptaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā avaśiṣṭaṃ viṣeṇa dūṣayiṣyāmaḥ |
V05n746:3419: ye'pi pānīyasya gatāstairapyevameva vicārya yāvadāpyaṃ pānīyaṃ pītvāvaśiṣṭaṃ viṣeṇa dūṣitamādāyāgatāḥ |
V05n746:3420: yairmāṃsaṃ bhakṣitaṃ taiḥ pānīyaṃ pītam yairapi māṃsaṃ bhakṣitam |
V05n746:3432: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo'sau jambuka eṣa evāsāvupanaṇḍastena kālena tena samayena |
V05n746:3436: tena khalu samayenānyatamo bhikṣurābādhiko duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ |
V05n746:3453: upasthāyikāścedbahavo bhavanti sarvaiḥ ṣaṭpariṣkārāḥ sāmānyaṃ bhājayitavyāḥ |
V05n746:3464: na lūhāni dātavyāni api tu madhyāni dātavyānīti |
V05n746:3465: glānaḥ asaṃviditā eva sāṃdhike śayanāsane kālaṃ kurvanti |
V05n746:3467: glānopasthāyakena glānasya nimittaṃ kuśalena bhavitavyaṃ muhurmuhuḥ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ kṛtyasya na hāpayitavyam |
V05n746:3468: śarīrāvasthāṃ jñātvā paudgalike śayanāsane vyājenāvatārya śāyitavya iti |
V05n746:3472: madīyaṃ pātracīvaraṃ mṛte mayi tava yathāsukhamiti |
V05n746:3487: tena khalu samayenānyatamo bhikṣurābādhiko duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ |
V05n746:3497: yo'sau bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ kālagataḥ kiṃ tenopasthāyiko'bhihitaḥ |
V05n746:3503: tad yadyasya bhaiṣajyaṃ nāsti taṃ pṛṣṭvā dānapatayaḥ samādāpayitavyāḥ |
V05n746:3508: sacettadapi na saṃpadyate yattathāgatacatye vā gandhakuṭyāṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā patākā vā ābharaṇakaṃ vā saṃghena dānīyaṃ dātavyamiti |
V05n746:3523: sa tasyāntike cittaṃ pradūṣya pātre'dhyavasitaḥ kālagataḥ |
V05n746:3531: na kenacit tasya bhikṣoḥ pātrasthavikā mocayitavyā |
V05n746:3545: yatra nāmaikasya sattvasya triṣu sthāneṣu kāyo dahyate |
V05n746:3553: api tu yadi glānaḥ svaṃ pariṣkāraṃ yācate |
V05n746:3558: tena khalu samayenānyatamo bhikṣurglāno layane kālagataḥ |
V05n746:3567: pūrvaṃ tāvanmṛto bhikṣurabhinirhartavyaḥ paścāttasya pātracīvaraṃ bhājayitavyamiti |
V05n746:3570: bhikṣavastamabhinirhṛtya eva meva śmaśāne chorayitvā vihāramāgataḥ |
V05n746:3583: tena khalu samayenānyatamo bhikṣurglāno layane kālagataḥ |
V05n746:3584: sa bhikṣurādahanaṃ nītvā śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā dagdhaḥ |
V05n746:3587: sa laguḍamādāyotthitaḥ tattāvanmāmuddiśya dharmaśravaṇamanuprayacchatha tāvaccīvarakāṇi bhājayatheti |
V05n746:3590: tamuddiśya dharmaśravaṇaṃ dattvā dakṣiṇāmuddiśya paścāccīvarakāṇi bhājayitavyānīti |
V05n746:3593: sīmā catuṣkikāṃ kṛtvā aṣṭau dūtena karayet ||29 ||
V05n746:3595: tena khalu samayenānyatamena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ |
V05n746:3606: atha bhagavān ciraprakrāntaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā apāvaraṇīṃ gṛhītvā ārāmeṇārāmaṃ vihāreṇa vihāraṃ parigaṇena parigaṇaṃ caṃkrameṇa caṃkramamanucaṃkramyamāṇo'nuvicarati |
V05n746:3608: tatra bhikṣurbāḍhaglānaḥ alpajñātaḥ sve mūtra purīṣe nimagno bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā'parasvaramakārṣīt |
V05n746:3612: kasmāttvaṃ bhikṣo mā trailokyanāthamuddiśya pravrajita evaṃ virauṣi |
V05n746:3615: na me bhadanta kaścitsabrahmacārī upasthānaṃ karotyavalokayati vā |
V05n746:3616: asti tvayā bhikṣavo kasyacit sabrahmacāriṇa upasthānaṃ kṛtamavalokitaṃ vā |
V05n746:3620: aho bata śakro devendro'navataptānmahāsarasaḥ pānīyamādāya gandhamādanācca parvatānmṛttikāmānayediti |
V05n746:3621: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye bhagavāna laukikaṃ cittamutpādayati tasmin samaye śakrabrahmādayo'pi devā bhagavataścittamājānanti |
V05n746:3622: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ anavataptānmahāsarasaḥ aṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṅgāramādāya gandhamādanācca parvatānmṛttikāṃ laghuladhveva bhagavataḥ purastādasthāt |
V05n746:3626: naiṣa kauśikamuddiśya pravrajitaḥ kiṃ tu mām |
V05n746:3627: api tu kiṃ tvayaiṣa pūrvaṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ |
V05n746:3631: tato bhagavatā cīvaraṃ baddhvā cakrasvastikanandyāvartenānekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānāmāśvāsana karaṇakareṇāsau bhikṣurgṛhītvā mūtrapurīṣāt uddhṛtya ekānte sthāpitaḥ |
V05n746:3637: tato hastapādau saṃpraśodhya śakraṃ devendraṃ glānopasthānapūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā sandeśya samādāpya vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ |
V05n746:3639: dharmatā khalu buddhā bhagavantaḥ piṇḍatātanirhārakaṃ bhikṣumanayā pratisaṃmodanayā pratisaṃmodante |
V05n746:3640: kaccidbhikṣo praṇītaṃ bhaktaṃ saṃtapato bhirbhikṣusaṃgha iti |
V05n746:3643: kaccidānanda praṇītaṃ bhaktaṃ santarpito bhikṣusaṃgha iti |
V05n746:3647: gaccha ānanda amuṣmin vihāre vāḍhaglāno bhikṣuḥ |
V05n746:3656: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yadahaṃ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhujya kausīdyenātināmayeyam |
V05n746:3658: tena pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogamanuyuktena viharatā idameva ca pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatiṃ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatyasarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtamiti |
V05n746:3662: pratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṃmukhaṃ sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo'bhivādyaśca saṃvṛttaḥ |
V05n746:3664: eṣāṃ bhikṣavo glānānāṃ na mātā na pitā na cānyo bandhuḥ nānyatra yūyameva sabrahmacāriṇaḥ |
V05n746:3677: glānāvasthāṃ paricchidya eko vā dvau vā saṃbahulā vā |
V05n746:3681: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā tasya bhikṣoḥ svayamevamupasthānaṃ kṛtam |
V05n746:3684: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte'pyadhvani tasya mayā upasthānaṃ kṛtam |
V05n746:3686: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo'nyatamasminnāśramapade puṣpaphalasalilasampanne nānāvṛkṣopaśobhite ṛṣiḥ prativasati pañcābhijñaḥ |
V05n746:3691: yo'sau tena kālena tena samayena ṛṣirāsīdahaṃ saḥ |
V05n746:3692: yo'sau tasya ṛṣeḥ śiṣya eṣa evāsau bhikṣuḥ |
V05n746:3693: tadāpyasya mayā upasthānaṃ kṛtametarhyapyasya mayā upasthānaṃ kṛtam |
V05n746:3695: paśya bhadantātīva bhagavato glānakaḥ priya iti |
V05n746:3697: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte'pyadhvani mamātīva glānakāḥ priyāḥ |
V05n746:3699: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śivaghoṣāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ śivirnāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati |
V05n746:3700: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca |
V05n746:3701: tasya nāsti kiścidaparityājyaṃ yācanakebhyo viśeṣatastu glānebhyaḥ |
V05n746:3702: yāvadanyatamo gṛhapatirglānaḥ sarvavaidyapratyākhyāto rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ |
V05n746:3720: kumāra yadā tvaṃ māsāṃsagatastadāhamapi na kasya (prāgeva tva) miti |
V05n746:3724: kumāra yadā tvaṃ mama kukṣigatastadāhamapi na kasyacidruṣitapūrvā prāgeva tvamiti |
V05n746:3726: labdhaṃ bhaiṣajyamiti viditvā tena vaidyānāṃ (mā) jñā dattā |
V05n746:3730: deva vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣasyārthāya devasya kāye śastraṃ (na)
V05n746:3734: tena ca rudhireṇa ṣaṇmāsān pratidinaṃ tasmai yavāgūrdattā |
V05n746:3737: yo'sau rājā ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena |
V05n746:3739: punarapi śive rājñaḥ putrasya pārśvaśoṣo jātaḥ |
V05n746:3748: ādarśakaṃ kukkuṭakaṃ ca gṛhītvā samudrataṭaṃ gacchata |
V05n746:3749: tatra pāśān pātayitvā kukkuṭakasya purastādādarśaṃ sthāpayata |
V05n746:3750: kukkuṭaḥ svaṃ pratibimbaṃ dṛṣṭvā kukkuṭo'yamiti raviṣyati |
V05n746:3756: dharmatā hyeṣā aciravyativṛtte lokasanniveśe tiryañco'pi vākpravyāharaṇasamarthā bhavanti |
V05n746:3776: rājñā sapta udakamaṇayaḥ śobhanāmbhasaḥ pūrṇāḥ sthāpitāḥ |
V05n746:3777: sa teṣu yāvat snāto yāvatsuviśrānto jātaḥ |
V05n746:3778: tataḥ kāyasya balaṃ jñātvā sahasā utplutya śaraṇapṛṣṭhamabhirūḍho vigatabhayabhairavo gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n746:3780: tato rājā ca vaidyāśca saṃpūrṇaṃ mūrkhamaṇḍalam ||30 ||
V05n746:3785: bhavantaḥ jīva jīvakasya snānodakaṃ tanmāṃsena samabalamiti |
V05n746:3794: āyuṣman janapadān gatvā vaidyaṃ pṛṣṭvā bhaiṣajyaṃ seva (sva) |
V05n746:3798: sa dharmo bahujanāniṣṭo bahujanākrānto bahujanāpriyo bahujanāmanāpaḥ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaḥ yaduta maraṇaṃ nāma yo nāṃsavyādhinā neṣyati |
V05n746:3801: āyuṣman yadyapyevaṃ yathāpi yāvacchīlavān puruṣapudgalaściraṃ jīvati tāvad bahupuṇyaṃ prasūyate |
V05n746:3802: yāvad bahupuṇyaṃ prasūyate tāvacciraṃ svargeṣu modate |
V05n746:3810: ārya yādṛśa evāyaṃ tava rogastādṛśa eva rājñaḥ putrasya |
V05n746:3813: yadyapyetatte maṇḍamapi bhāgya viśeṣātpratilabhase tena te yāpyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
V05n746:3818: yadā yācanako dvāre tiṣṭhati tadāsau rauti |
V05n746:3824: putra asmābhirdvādaśabhirvarṣairdravyasaṃhāraṃ kṛtvā idaṃ ghṛtaṃ pakkam |
V05n746:3826: vicārayiṣyāmaḥ kiṃ prārthayatīti tasya kṛtakutūhalasvastyayanasya ghṛtaṃ pātukāmasya yācanakabhājanāśāmarmasaṃghaṭṭitaśarīrasya tadvṛttaṃ na rocate |
V05n746:3828: amba tāta na tāvatparibhokṣye yāvadyācanakaḥ praviśataḥ iti |
V05n746:3846: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau rājakumāraḥ ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena |
V05n746:3848: kiṃ bhadanta tena rājaputreṇa tena ca pratyeka buddhena karma kṛtam yena tayoryugapada vyādhirutpanno yugapacca vyupaśāntiriti |
V05n746:3850: tasyāmeva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayānyoghavatpratyupasthitāni avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
V05n746:3851: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante |
V05n746:3855: bhūdhātuṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca |
V05n746:3857: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām ||30 ||
V05n746:3858: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā babhūva |
V05n746:3862: tayorapi yaḥ kanīyān sa paurohityaṃ prārthayate |
V05n746:3863: yātutaḥ sattvā saṃsyandanta iti tayoḥ parasparaṃ sakhyamutpannam |
V05n746:3865: kaḥ upāyaḥ syād yenāhaṃ rājā bhaveyam |
V05n746:3868: yadi tvaṃ māṃ paurohitye sthāpayasi kathayāmīti |
V05n746:3877: tatastena tasya jyeṣṭhasya rājaputrasya bhaiṣajyaṃ dattam |
V05n746:3880: amātyaiḥ sa vyaṃga iti kṛtvā kanīyān rājye'bhiṣiktaḥ |
V05n746:3882: yāvadapareṇa samayena rājā purohitena sārdhaṃ saṃlāpena tiṣṭhati |
V05n746:3885: na śobhanaṃ mayā kṛtam yadrājyahetorbhrātā vyaṃgīkṛta iti |
V05n746:3893: tatastau pratyekabuddhe karān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhau |
V05n746:3894: yadāvābhyāmevaṃ vidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārāḥ kṛtā asya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyahi |
V05n746:3895: asya ca pāpasya vyaṃgīkaraṇasya karmaṇo vipākamanubhaveyamiti |
V05n746:3897: yo'sau rājaputra ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena |
V05n746:3899: yattābhyāṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā rājakumārasya bhaiṣajyaṃ dattaṃ tena yugapad vyaṃgau saṃvṛttau |
V05n746:3900: yattu vipratisārābhyāṃ vicārya punarbhaiṣajyaṃ dattaṃ tena yugapat svasthībhūtau |
V05n746:3901: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ |
V05n746:3904: tasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśuklepveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
V05n746:3907: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ śreṣṭhināmā gṛhapatirāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudyato vaiśravaṇadhanapratisparśī |
V05n746:3910: tad yathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatā catvaradevatā śṛṃgāradevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate |
V05n746:3915: apitu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraśca |
V05n746:3921: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca |
V05n746:3922: yadāsya devatārādhanenāpi na putro na duhitā tadā sarvadevatāḥ pratyākhyāya bhagavatyabhiprasannaḥ |
V05n746:3926: sa tasyānupūrvyā keśāvataraṇaṃ kṛtvā śikṣāpadāni grāhayitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n746:3933: tasyopasthānaṃ kartavyamiti hi bhikṣavo na jānante kena kartavyamiti |
V05n746:3939: ārya vayamasya divā cikitsikāṃ kurmaḥ rātrau glānyaṃ vardhate |
V05n746:3940: yadyeṣa gṛhaṃ nīyate vayamasya rātrau cikitsāṃ kuryāma iti |
V05n746:3947: sa yadā mūlagaṇḍapatrapuṣpaphalabhaiṣajyarupasthīyamāno na svasthībhavati tadā tenātmā paricchinno mṛtoamiti |
V05n746:3954: prabhūtaṃ cāsya hiraṇyasuvarṇamasti hastino'svā gāvo mahiṣyaḥ sannāhāni ca |
V05n746:3955: etacca sarvaṃ patrābhilikhitaṃ kṛtvā jetavanamāryasaṃghāya preṣitam |
V05n746:3957: āryopanandasantakabheva mayā apatrābhilikhitaṃ na pratilabdhaṃ prāgena patrābhilikhitaṃ pratilapsye |
V05n746:3965: dvipadā catuṣpadā yāvat annadānaṃ ca bhaiṣajyam |
V05n746:3966: dāso vā prastaraṃ labhyaṃ yathāyogena bhājayet ||32 ||
V05n746:3977: śāṭakāḥ paṭakā carmabhāṇḍamupānahastailakutupāḥ kuṇḍīkākarakāśca samagreṇa saṃghena bhājayitavyāḥ |
V05n746:3978: yaṣṭa (yo yā) āyatāstā jambūcchāyikāḥ pratimāyā dhvajavaṃśāḥ kārayitavyāḥ |
V05n746:3979: yāṃ svalpāstāḥ khaṃkharakāḥ kṛtvā bhikṣuṇāṃ dātavyāḥ |
V05n746:3983: catuṣpadānāṃ hastino'śvā uṣṭrāḥ kharā vesarāśca rājña upayogāḥ |
V05n746:3984: mahiṣyaḥ ajā eḍakāścaturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya sādhāraṇā avibhājyāḥ |
V05n746:3985: yaśca sannāho yaccānyatra rājopayojyaṃ tatsarvaṃ rājña upanāmayitavyam |
V05n746:3986: sthāpayitvāyudhāni taiḥ śastrakaiḥ sūcyaḥ khaṃkharakāśca kārayitvā saṃghe cārayitavyāḥ |
V05n746:3987: raṃgāṇāṃ mahāraṃgaḥ kaṃkuṣṭahiṃgulukarājapaṭyādayaste gandhakuṭyāṃ prakṣeptavyāḥ pratimopayogikāḥ |
V05n746:3995: ratnānāṃ muktā varjayitvā maṇivaiḍūrya dakṣiṇāvartaparyantāni tu dvau bhāgau kartavyānīti |
V05n746:4001: pustakānāṃ buddhavacanapustakā avibhajya cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dhāraṇakoṣṭhikāyāṃ prakṣeptavyāḥ |
V05n746:4003: patralekhyaṃ yacchīghraṃ śakyate sādhayituṃ tasya dravyavibhāge tadbhikṣubhirbhājayitavyam |
V05n746:4006: suvarṇaṃ ca hiraṇyaṃ cānyacca kṛtākṛtaṃ trayo bhāgāḥ kartavyāḥ |
V05n746:4010: yo buddhasya tena gandhakuṭyāṃ keśanakhastūpeṣu ca khaṇḍachuṭṭaṃ pratisaṃskartavyam |
V05n746:4011: yodharmasya tena buddhavacanaṃ lekhayitavyaṃ siṃhāsane vā upayoktavyam |
V05n746:4014: yadā rājñā prasenajitā kosalena toyikāmahaḥ prasthāpitastadā tatra bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ mahāsannipāto bhavati |
V05n746:4042: tena tāsāmanurakṣayā stokastokaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvāhṇikā kṛtā |
V05n746:4043: tathaiva velāyāṃ bhuktamakāle pānakaṃ ca pītam |
V05n746:4066: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīmākoṭya pṛṣṭhavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam |
V05n746:4069: tasya pātracīvaram sacīvaracīvarikam ānandasya haste tiṣṭhati |
V05n746:4071: yat saṃgho mūlaphalgunasya bhikṣo pātracīvaraṃ sacīvaracīvarikamānandena bhikṣuṇā prativastu mṛtapariṣkārikamadhitiṣṭhedityeṣā jñaptiḥ |
V05n746:4073: anyatra bhadanta bhikṣuḥ kālaṃ kuryādanyatrāsya pātracīvaramanyatra prativastukaḥ |
V05n746:4077: tena khalu samayena navakarmiko bhikṣuḥ kālagataḥ |
V05n746:4087: tasya pātracīvaraṃ sacīvaracīvarikaṃ trīn bhāgān kartavyam |
V05n746:4092: buddhasantakena buddhapūjā vā gandhakuṭyāṃ stūpe vā navakarma kartavyam |
V05n746:4098: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulā bhikṣavo janapadacārikāṃ caranto'nupūrveṇa śrāvastyāmupanagaramanuprāptāḥ |
V05n746:4103: śrāvastī tannivāsibhirgopālakaiḥ paśupālakaistṛṇahārakaiḥ kāṣṭhahārakaiḥ pathājīvairutpathājīvaiśca manuṣyaiḥ samantādākīrṇā |
V05n746:4104: te yatra yatra niṣīdanti bhājayāma iti tatra tatra mahājanena parivāryante |
V05n746:4131: tena bhikṣuṇā yena preṣitāni tasya viśvāsena parimuktāni |
V05n746:4135: yasya yena bhikṣuṇā preṣitāni tasya tena viśvāsena paribhuktāni |
V05n746:4146: yasya preṣitāni tasya kalpena tasya mṛtapariṣkārikamadhitiṣṭati |
V05n746:4161: bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāṇi preṣayati yasya preṣitāni sa kālagataḥ |
V05n746:4173: yena preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkārikamadhi tiṣṭhati |
V05n746:4178: sa kālagataḥ yenāpi preṣitāni sa kālagataḥ |
